item.title: Gas Gallery
item.description:
Exactly the next day after watching After Hours, I visited a free painting gallery in a small city and got some impressions on another side of the moon from that movie.

The first thing I noticed was patched carpet on the floor – not exactly The Shining style but still a notable detail.

The corridor led me into the first small room. While I was checking pictures there alone, a guy passed nearby. He was moving as if holding and looking into an invisible mobile phone in his hand; he greeted me and made an odd meaningless pause near me.
